channel.title: Help - TeamTorva - Change Cache
channel.description:
[b]i wanna rename the cache & add it back into the client i understand i have to upload to dropbox (public) .zip but i have no idea where about i add the link.
i changed the cachedownloader but still error maybe i need to change more files.
does anyone know?[/b]

item.title: Help - TeamTorva - Change Cache
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“hatem, post:4, topic:528920”]first of all, u have to change the name of the cache it would be found in signlink.java.

then u have to rar the cache .zip exactly as u said then u have to upload it at dropbox and copy the link and paste it in cachedownloa. you u done!.[/quote]

u gotta be wrong because that dont work.

Did you change the name of the cache that it is looking for in Signlink.java?
gotta do this but no idea how.

Read full topic

item.title: Help - TeamTorva - Change Cache
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

first of all, u have to change the name of the cache it would be found in signlink.java.

then u have to rar the cache .zip exactly as u said then u have to upload it at dropbox and copy the link and paste it in cachedownloa. you u done!.

Read full topic
